Title: Microsoft Claims It Will Double Its Data Center Footprint in Two Years
Description: Microsoft's CEO, Satya Nadella, told investors that the company plans to double its data center footprint over the next two years.

Title: Canada Will Soon Lose Its Hard-Won Measles-Free Status. America Is Next
Description:
After a year of ongoing outbreaks, Canada is expected to lose its measles-free status.
Experts say the U.S.
is on track for the same fate.

Title: 'Something special' - Dowman makes history for Arsenal
Description:
Another day, another record for 15-year-old Max Dowman.
But Arsenal's teenage prodigy is taking everything in his stride, according to his manager Mikel Arteta.

Title: The dads helping daughters through their periods
Description: A growing number of dads are challenging the unfounded stigma around talking to their children about periods.

Title: Android 16 QPR2 Beta 3.2 is here, bringing Pixel testers more bug fixes

Title: Toronto Blue Jays take a 3-2 lead over Los Angeles Dodgers in World Series
Description: Trey Yesavage set a World Series rookie record with 12 strikeouts in a 6-1 victory over the Los Angeles Dodgers that moved them within one win of their first championship since 1993.

Title: Charlie Sheen says hiding his HIV diagnosis was harder than living with it
Description:
"You know, it's not the best news.
But there was other news that could have been a lot worse, you know?" Charlie Sheen said.

Title: Ukrainian fighter pilot says the Gripen is the only fighter in the world for which he'd sell his soul
Description: Famed pilot Vadym Voroshylov called Sweden's Gripen jet the ideal one for Ukraine.

Title: Boomers want to axe property taxes. Millennials and Gen Z would pay for it.
Description:
Boomers want to stop paying property taxes on the valuable real estate they own.
That could hamstring millennials and Gen Zers trying to buy a home.
